page.title: 01GAZETEER TYPE INFORMATION.
page.content:
{FARLOW.}5km (4 miles) North West of Cleobury Mortimer, Shropshire. 2000+ acres. { {ORETON. }Lies immediately to the East of Farlow. The Farlow & Oreton village Hall is half a mile South East of the Primary School and Parish Church. { { }This area is predominantly farmland (see Farming page 4) and a little common land, all under the slopes of the Shropshire Clee Hills.
{The scattered rural communities around {Farlow school lie within a triangle of {main roads linking}Bridgnorth (pop 9000+){14km to N.E. ,}Ludlow (pop 7000+){14km to S.W. &}Bewdley ) (pop 7000+){20km to E.S.E.
